channel.title: Class Suggestion - Usurper
channel.description:
Lore: Greed is a powerful force. The Usurper only desires the lifestyle of the king, however he is not the rightful heir to the throne. Taking advantage of the panic caused by the Unseen or Cult, he wants to manipulate the BD into declaring him king.
**Name - Usurper ** Faction - Neutral Social - Takes place of Scorned or Fool.
Passive 1 - Coward's Luck - Immune to death once.
Passive 2 - Royal Blood
Night ability 1 - Usurp - Choose a class. Appear that class to all investigators tonight. 3 uses.
Night ability 2 - Rumours - If a player dies tonight, it will appear as if the King ordered their execution. 2 uses.
Win condition - Become a Neutral King.

item.description:

item.title: Class Suggestion - Usurper
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Seems solid. I think rumors changes the game much though, since King can get away with suspicious actions by claiming to be Rumored. Otherwise this instantly takes out king. I’d replace this with a different ability, but I’m not sure what would be a good replacement. Preferably some milder anti-king ability.
